aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.repositoryDescription: CodeCommit repository that will be used as the source repository for the pay as you go vpn app

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.emailVerificationMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.smsVerificationMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}

verificationMessageTemplate.emailMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}
verificationMessageTemplate.smsMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}

Fn::Join:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run createEnvironmentFile --

eu-west-2
        - npm run buildWebApp
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: build
    files:
      - '**/*'
  cache:
    paths:
      - packages/webApp/node_modules/**/*
